verbose_text: The results of immunohistochemical staining showed that the glomerular expression of alpha-SMA (XREF_FIG) and collagen IV (XREF_FIG) was markedly enhanced, primarily in the mesangial area; however, nephrin (XREF_FIG) expression was significantly reduced in LN mice compared to levels in control mice (XREF_FIG).
evidence: expression of alpha-SMA ( XREF_FIG ) and collagen IV
